title: START NOW
itunes:title: START NOW
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
START NOW! Stop waiting for the perfect moment and start now. If you're always planning, reading, thinking and waiting for the perfect time to start something new, you'll never begin. Stop waiting for the perfect moment and start today! Powerful motivational speech featuring new speeches from Walter Bond (https://bit.ly/WalterBondMotiversity) , Dr. Jessica Houston (https://bit.ly/DrJessicaHoustonMotiversity) and Marcus "Elevation" Taylor (https://bit.ly/MarcusTaylorMotiversity).


This speech was sponsored by the UAE Nation Brand Project.


Music by Epic Motiversity Music ( https://bit.ly/EpicMotiversityMusic) and Really Slow Motion (https://bit.ly/RSMMusic).


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
